articles.title: Opinion: I'm 26 and I have some news for my peers on vaccination
articles.description: Annika Olson writes that the hesitation on the Covid-19 vaccine among young people in the US should be fought back with facts.
articles.content: Annika Olson is the assistant director of policy research at the Institute for Urban Policy Research and Analysis at the University of Texas at Austin and a Public Voices Fellow of The OpEd Project. … [+4220 chars]

articles.title: Vaccine misinformation rampant on social media parenting groups - CNN Video
articles.description: Covid-19 vaccine misinformation is rampant in an unexpected place: Mommy groups on Facebook. CNN's Elle Reeve takes a closer look.

articles.title: New vaccines could one day be sent by mail - CNN Video
articles.description: New vaccines are being developed that could transform access and ease of use for future pandemics, as well as for fighting existing diseases.

articles.title: 10 reasons why young, healthy people really need to get vaccinated
articles.description: Young adults are now the biggest spreaders of coronavirus. But many say they don't plan to get vaccinated -- which could lead to new strains that may ruin everyone's vaccinations.
articles.content:

articles.author: Catherine E. Shoichet, CNN
articles.title: We're starting to see how the pandemic affected births in the US
articles.description: The birth rate in the US fell in the last quarter of 2020, decreasing more than 6% from the same time period the previous year. The data includes December, the first month when most babies born would have been conceived after the start of the pandemic.
